args: [PATH]  Database path used for storing data [env: SURREAL_PATH=] [default: memory]

options.description: The logging level for the database server [env: SURREAL_LOG=] [default: info] [possible values: none,full, error, warn, info, debug, trace]
Whether to hide the startup banner [env: SURREAL_NO_BANNER=]

database.description: The interval at which to run node agent tick (including garbage collection) [env: SURREAL_TICK_INTERVAL=][default: 10s]
Whether strict mode is enabled on this database instance [env: SURREAL_STRICT=]
The maximum duration that a set of statements can run for [env:SURREAL_QUERY_TIMEOUT=]
The maximum duration that any single transaction can run for [env: SURREAL_TRANSACTION_TIMEOUT=]
Sets the directory for storing temporary database files [env: SURREAL_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY=]

authentication.description: The username for the initial database root user. Only if no other root user exists [env:SURREAL_USER=] [aliases: user]
The password for the initial database root user. Only if no other root user exists [env:SURREAL_PASS=] [aliases: pass]

Datastore_connection.description: Path to the CA file used when connecting to the remote KV store [env: SURREAL_KVS_CA=]
Path to the certificate file used when connecting to the remote KV store [env:SURREAL_KVS_CRT=]
Path to the private key file used when connecting to the remote KV store [env:SURREAL_KVS_KEY=]

http_server.description: Path to the certificate file for encrypted client connections [env: SURREAL_WEB_CRT=]
Path to the private key file for encrypted client connections [env: SURREAL_WEB_KEY=]
The method of detecting the client's IP address [env: SURREAL_CLIENT_IP=] [default:socket] [possible values: none, socket, CF-Connecting-IP, Fly-Client-IP,True-Client-IP, X-Real-IP, X-Forwarded-For]
The hostname or ip address to listen for connections on [env: SURREAL_BIND=] [default:0.0.0.0:8000]

capabilities.description: Allow all capabilities [env: SURREAL_CAPS_ALLOW_ALL=] [possible values:true, false]
Allow execution of scripting functions [env: SURREAL_CAPS_ALLOW_SCRIPT=][possible values: true, false]
Allow guest users to execute queries [env: SURREAL_CAPS_ALLOW_GUESTS=][possible values: true, false]
Allow execution of all functions. Optionally, you can provide a comma-separated list of function names to allow [env:SURREAL_CAPS_ALLOW_FUNC=]
Allow all outbound network access. Optionally, you can provide a comma-separated list of targets to allow [env: SURREAL_CAPS_ALLOW_NET=]
Deny all capabilities [env: SURREAL_CAPS_DENY_ALL=] [possible values:true, false]
Deny execution of scripting functions [env: SURREAL_CAPS_DENY_SCRIPT=][possible values: true, false]
Deny guest users to execute queries [env: SURREAL_CAPS_DENY_GUESTS=][possible values: true, false]
Deny execution of all functions. Optionally, you can provide a comma-separated list of function names to deny [env:SURREAL_CAPS_DENY_FUNC=]
Deny all outbound network access. Optionally, you can provide a comma-separated list of targets to deny [env: SURREAL_CAPS_DENY_NET=]
